title: to which, pursuant to section 100(2)(b) of that Act, a draft has been laid before
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Temporary Business
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2022 (Temporary Business 

Energy Support Scheme) (Specified Period) (No. 2) Order 2023.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2022 (temporary business energy support scheme) (specified period) (no 2) order 2023

title: to which, pursuant to section 100(2)(b) of that Act, a draft has been laid before
heading: 2. The day referred to in the definition of “specified period” in section
text_raw:
2. The day referred to in the definition of “specified period” in section 
101(1) of the Finance Act 2022 (No. 44 of 2022) as the day on which the period 
therein referred to shall expire shall be 31 July 2023. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 May, 2023. 

MICHAEL MCGRATH, 
Minister for Finance. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 26th May, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [257] 3
